name: StarBoy (itch) (mrkdji)
description:
During its journey StarBoy crashed and got lost in an unknown planet, help him return back to its spaceship!

CONTROLS

ActionsKeysMoveARROW KEYS | A | DJumpX | JGrab | ThrowC | KClimb LadderARROW KEYS | W | SOpen Pause MenuENTER | RETURN
